attributes.action: A TV debate on the harm caused by Lockdown/Restrictions compared to Covid 19
attributes.background: A live open televised debate amongst a variety of scientists, politicians and experts, with contrasting views; where the science is laid bare. Societal impacts and long term implications discussed with the presence of a studio audience, invited to take part with questions.

rejection.details:
Organising a TV debate would be a matter for individual broadcasters, not the Government or House of Commons.

We could accept a petition calling for a public inquiry into the impact of Covid-19 restrictions, which could consider how this would have compared to not implementing these restrictions.
